article: John was worried. This was his first time to go traveling  by air  . He didn't know how  to find his seat,  _  he went to the air hostess and asked, "Could you help me? I can't find my seat." The air hostess showed  _  the seat and told him   to sit down  and fasten the seat belt . She told John not to move about when the plane was going up. And she also said that John's ears might feel  a little  strange, but he didn't need to  worry about it because many people felt   _  that. When the plane was flying very high, John could stand up and walk around. He could  _  read books, newspapers or see films. The air hostess would  _ food and drinks. John would enjoy the flight and   arrive home soon.
